text: Joy Giovanni (born January 20, 1978) is an American actress, glamour model, and former WWE Diva. She is best known for her time with World Wrestling Entertainment, where she worked on their SmackDown! brand. == Personal life == She has a son, who was born on October 20, 1998, and a daughter, who was born on November 19, 2000. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:Models from Massachusetts Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts
title: Joy Giovanni
